list.name: Graph Data
list.text: 300GB of graph data. 1,262,024 unique function call graphs across 696 families and 47 types of malware.

list.name: Image Data
list.text: 80GB of image data. 1,262,024 unique function call graphs across 696 families and 47 types of malware.

list.name: Metadata
list.text: Antivirus vendors label malicious software according to a variety of conventions, creating noisy labels. To address this challenging research problem,we release VirusTotal reports containing 70 antivirus labels for each file

list.name: Image Data
list.text: We provide three files containing a recommended data split to train, validate and test your models in a ratio of 70%, 10% and 20%, respectively.
